translations: v．重新估值：重新确定货币、资产或商品的价值。
· The government revalues the currency to control inflation.
政府重新估值货币以控制通货膨胀。

sentences.sentence: If China revalues the yuan in 2010 it may be for similar reasons.
sentences.translation: 如果2010年中国允许人民币升值，也可能会出于类似的考虑。

sentences.sentence: "If China revalues [the renminbi], it will have a positive impact on our external sector," Mr Subbarao said.
sentences.translation: “如果中国让[人民币]升值，那将对我们的对外部门产生正面影响，”苏巴拉奥表示。

sentences.sentence: According to exchange rate reasonable balanced level surveying, the RMB revalues 2% to US dollar today, namely 1 US dollar exchanges 8.11 Yuan.
sentences.translation: 根据对汇率合理均衡水平的测算，人民币对美元即日升值2%，即1美元兑8.11元人民币。
